message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. Given its value and the benefits it offers, I'm asking for $20,000. I'm confident it will be a worthwhile investment for you.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am looking to stay within my budget. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $14,000?
Hi Bob, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate.  While I value your offer, $20,000 is my bottom line. I'm confident that the value you'll gain from this product far exceeds this price.
